Titles.RequiresRL: Rideable requires routinglib to be active for the token following feature to work

defaultRideable.name: Tokens rideable by default
defaultRideable.descrp: Whether all tokens should be rideable by default (can be changed for each token in the token settings)

allowTileRiding.name: Tiles can be mounted
allowTileRiding.descrp: Whether tiles can be mounted, just like tokens

allowMountingonEntering.name: Allow mount on enter
allowMountingonEntering.descrp: Allow tokens and tiles so be set up to be mounted by tokens that enter their space

LocknKeyintegration.name: Lock & Key integration
LocknKeyintegration.descrp: Allows rideable tokens to be locked

DFredsEffectsIntegration.name: DFreds Convenient Effects integration
DFredsEffectsIntegration.descrp: Allows certain effects to be applied to mounted and grappled tokens

TaggerMountingIntegration.name: Tagger mounting integration
TaggerMountingIntegration.descrp: Allows tokens to be mounted and unmounted via tags (tag: "Rideable:{RiderTokenID}")

RidingHeight.name: Riding height
RidingHeight.descrp: The z-height which a riding token has compared to its mount (recommended to be above 0)

useRidingHeight.name: Use riding height by default
useRidingHeight.descrp: If tokens use riding height by default

useRiddenTokenHeight.name: Use token height
useRiddenTokenHeight.descrp: Uses a the riddens token height (added through the "Wall-Height" module) instead of the set "Riding height"

MountingDistance.name: Mounting distance
MountingDistance.descrp: The maximum distance a token can have to its mounting target (-1 for an unlimited range)

UseArmReachDistance.name: Use "Arms Reach" distance
UseArmReachDistance.descrp: Uses the distance set in the "Arms Reach" for the mounting distance

BorderDistance.name: Border to border distance
BorderDistance.descrp: If the mounting distance should be calculated from the tokens border instead of the middle point (only works correctly for circular/square tokens)

MaxRiders.name: Maximum riders per token
MaxRiders.descrp: The maximum amount of tokens, a token can be ridden by (-1 for unlimited)

RiderMovementworlddefault.name: Rider movement default setting
RiderMovementworlddefault.descrp: Default setting for the Rider movement of the players (does not override)

MountButtonDefaultPosition.name: Mount button default position
MountButtonDefaultPosition.descrp: Default setting for the position of the mount button (does not override)

RiderMovement.name: Rider movement
RiderMovement.descrp: What should happen if a riding token tries to move on its own

RiderProxySelect.name: Rider proxy select
RiderProxySelect.descrp: If the ridden token should be selected instead of the cliecked rider

RiderRotation.name: Link rotations
RiderRotation.descrp: Rotates alls riders if a ridden token is rotated (also works with "Move ridden Token" option)

RidingSystemEffects.name: Apply "Mounted" effect
RidingSystemEffects.descrp: If a token starts riding, a system dependent effect will be applied to the token

CustomRidingEffects.name: Custom riding effects
CustomRidingEffects.descrp: Effect that are applied to tokens when they start riding (Names or IDs, seperated with ";")

RideableTag.name: "Rideable" trait
RideableTag.descrp: Allows tokens which have the 'Rideable' trait to be ridden (the "Rideable" trait has to be manually added under settings>Pathfinder 2nd Edition>Manage Honebrew Elements>Creature Traits)

FamiliarRiding.name: Familiar riding
FamiliarRiding.descrp: Allows for familiars to ride their master, the familairs will be placed at the corners of their master

Grappling.name: Grappling
Grappling.descrp: Allows tokens to grapple one another (grappled tokens can only be unmounted by the grappling token)

GrapplingSystemEffects.name: Apply "Grappled" effect
GrapplingSystemEffects.descrp: If a token gets grappled, a system dependent effect will be applied to the token

StopGrappleonEffectRemoval.name: Stop grapple on effect removal
StopGrappleonEffectRemoval.descrp: If a token should be released as soon as the grapple effect is removed

GrappleplacementDefault.name: Grapple placement default
GrappleplacementDefault.descrp: The standard grapple placement of tokens

PreventEnemyRiding.name: Prevent enemy riding
PreventEnemyRiding.descrp: Stops tokens from riding enemy tokens (GMs can still override this)

FitRidersize.name: Adjust rider size
FitRidersize.descrp: Adjusts the size of the rider in the case that it is greater or equal to the size of the ridden token

FitRiderSizeFactor.name: Adjusted rider size factor
FitRiderSizeFactor.descrp: The factor by which the sizre of riders is adjusted in cases where they are greater or equal in size to the ridden token

MessagePopUps.name: Message popups
MessagePopUps.descrp: Enables multible popups upon actions such as mounting or dismounting

OnlyownedMessagePopUps.name: Own message popups only
OnlyownedMessagePopUps.descrp: Only shows the message popups from tokens you control

EnableFollowing.name: Enable Token following
EnableFollowing.descrp: If Token following is active in this world

FollowingAlgorithm.name: Following algorithm
FollowingAlgorithm.descrp: Which following algorithm is used (install routinglib for more options)

FollowingCombatBehaviour.name: In combat follow behaviour
FollowingCombatBehaviour.descrp: How following tokens behave in combat

OnlyfollowViewed.name: Only follow visible
OnlyfollowViewed.descrp: If only currently visible tokens should be followed

PreventFollowerStacking.name: Prevent Follower stacking
PreventFollowerStacking.descrp: If followers of the same token should be prevented from stacking, they might still stack in tight areas

OnFollowerMovement.name: Follower movement
OnFollowerMovement.descrp: What should happen if a following token tries to move on its own

Mount.name: Mount
Mount.descrp: Mount controlled Tokens to targeted Token (alternative Macro: "Mount")

UnMount.name: Unmount
UnMount.descrp: Unmount controlled Tokens from their ridden Token, or unmount targeted Token from controlled Token (alternative Macro: "Unmount")

MountFamiliar.name: Mount familiar
MountFamiliar.descrp: Mount controlled familiars to targeted Token if targeted Token is master(alternative Macro: "MountFamiliar") (only if setting "Familiar riding" is activated)

GrappleTarget.name: Grapple/release target
GrappleTarget.descrp: Mount targeted token to controlled Token, can only be unmounted by grappling token(alternative Macro: "Grapple") (only if setting "Grappling" is activated)

ToggleMount.name: Toggle mount
ToggleMount.descrp: Mount or dismount controlled Tokens to/from targeted Token

ToggleGrapplePlacement.name: Switch Grapple placement
ToggleGrapplePlacement.descrp: Switches between the placements options of grapple tokens for the selected tokens

TogglePiloting.name: Toggle piloting
TogglePiloting.descrp: Start of stop piloting the currently mounted token

ToggleFollowing.name: Toggle following
ToggleFollowing.descrp: Start of stop the selected tokens from following the targeted or followed token

Popup.cantbeMoved: {cantbeMoved} cant be moved (may be attached to something)

MaxRiderFlag.name: Maximum riders
MaxRiderFlag.descrp: Overrides the global setting for this token (-1 for unlimited, leave empty to return to default world setting)

MountonEnterFlag.name: Mount on enter
MountonEnterFlag.descrp: Tokens that enter this tokens/tiles space mount it

AutoMountBlackListFlag.name: Mount on enter blacklist
AutoMountBlackListFlag.descrp: Token names, IDs and actor IDs which will not be mounted on enter (seperated with ";")

AutoMountWhiteListFlag.name: Mount on enter whitelist
AutoMountWhiteListFlag.descrp: Token names, IDs and actor IDs which are allowed to be mounted on enter (seperated with ";", empty to ignore)

RiderPositioningFlag.name: Rider positioning
RiderPositioningFlag.descrp: The pattern in which the rider tokens will be placed

RiderOffsetFlag.name: Riders offset
RiderOffsetFlag.descrp: The placement offset for Riders [in scene squares]

TileRideableNameFlag.name: Tile name
TileRideableNameFlag.descrp: Name used by Rideable for this tile (e.g. Popups)

CustomRidingheightFlag.name: Custom riding height
CustomRidingheightFlag.descrp: Custom height of this token, used for its riders (leave empty for default value)

UseRidingHeightFlag.name: Use riding height
UseRidingHeightFlag.descrp: If the elevation of this tokens riders should be managed

RidersScaleFlag.name: Riders scale
RidersScaleFlag.descrp: Scale applied to riders of this object (only graphical)

InsideMovementFlag.name: Riders can move freely
InsideMovementFlag.descrp: If riders can move freely within the boundaries of this token

SpawnRidersFlag.name: Spawn riders
SpawnRidersFlag.descrp: Riders this token spawns with (Names or IDs, seperated with ";")

MountingEffectsFlag.name: Riding effects
MountingEffectsFlag.descrp: Effects that are applied to riders of this token (Names or IDs, seperated with ";")

WorldMEffectOverrideFlag.name: Override world riding effects
WorldMEffectOverrideFlag.descrp: Overrides the world standard riding effects with the above set effects (instead of appending them)

SelfApplyEffectsFlag.name: Self apply riding effects
SelfApplyEffectsFlag.descrp: If this token should apply its own riding effects while riding

forMountEffectsFlag.name: Mount effects
forMountEffectsFlag.descrp: Effects that are applied to mounts of this token (Names or IDs, seperated with ";")

canbeGrappledFlag.name: Can be grappled
canbeGrappledFlag.descrp: If this token can be grappled

CanbePilotedFlag.name: Can be piloted
CanbePilotedFlag.descrp: Players can pilot this token, allowing them to move it even if they don't own it

PilotedbyDefaultFlag.name: Piloted by default
PilotedbyDefaultFlag.descrp: If everyone riding this token automatically pilots this token (not compatible with "Riders can move freely")
